p: Observation form the results showed that the Lucky nut seed is rich in oil, and its properties such as the density, low moisture content, higher heating value, the cetane number, the API and the diesel index proved it suitability for biofuel production. In addition, the high FFA and the high unsaturated acid value found in the Lucky nut oil, showed its non-edibility. Hence, the Lucky nut proved its suitability for a good feedstock for environmental friendly biofuel.
